Name: Say Goodbye
About the game: This visual novel about an ordinary man with his typical problems. Suddenly, you got a report that your distant cousin died in a car crash. Fortunately, her daughter wasn't with her. You take the girl under your wing. But Soon, Something Starts to Go Wrong...
